reviews.sentence: nice and relaxing. This hotel is so ready and prepare for guests relaxing vacation. We had a suite room that had a nice living room just across the infinity pool. The infinity pool was beautiful and nice. The staff were so friendly but also gave us lits of privacy no disturbing. The room had its own cofe maker nice one. And they prepared us with a yoga mat beach bag and beach towel that was very nice do not bother to bring lots of things with you because you can just used the hotel facilities. The breakfast had lots of choice but the taste was just ok. TV channel was so limited but if you have Bali and its beaches and hotel facilities why bother ti stay and watch TV. Definitely a recommended hotel to stay and have a very nice weekend.

First time to Bali and I am so happy I stayed at the Pullman. I love everything about the Pullman staff were so nice and welcoming and attentive. There great with kids and there kids pool is great too. If I had to pick one thing I did not like was the smell of sewerage in the toilet but it was slight not bad.

We were really happy with the service and location of Pullman Legian. The food was much better than expected and we especially enjoyed the Indonesian amp curry themed buffets by the pool. The live music was a lovely bonus. Sunset by the rooftop pool was also special. And also a big thumbs up to the guys running the sunrise yoga.

Lovely. We stayed in a 1 bedroom suite for 4 nights and loved it. The room was huge and had 2 bathrooms a living room with sofa bed and a big balcony overlooking the main pool. Plenty of room for our 25yo to enjoy. And plenty of room for us to relax once she was asleep. The cot supplied was a good condition portacot. It was well furnished. Loved the extra touches such as espresso machine. Our only 2 complaints in regards to the room in fact in regards to the whole stay where that the room had a smell especially noticeable after being out and coming back to the closed room. To describe it would be a musty water smell it also smelt when you first turned on the shower. In saying this is was not so terrible that we could not deal with it but I would imagine some people would not want to put up with it being that it is a five star hotel and you are paying good money. We on the other hand loved everything else about this resort that it was a small gripe to have. Our second complaint would be house keeping. They were very average in cleaning compared to other places we have stayed. Now besides that everything was fantastic. The staff service facilities are first rate. Breakfast was a massive setup and you would be hard pressed not to find something for even the fussiest eaters. We had a lunch and dinner there both were lovely. The nightly buffets looked good also. We had an hour bali massage at the spa as a couple and this was heaven. The spa is beautiful and peaceful. Everything you could need and want is available. The location is perfect opposite the beach and along Melasti street so no limit to food and shopping just outside the door. The transfer service was prompt and helpful. Would definitely stay again.

Rooms were spatias and clean everyone was friendly and the pools and Lounge areas were nice but this is where the positives stop. Bar and food prices are absolutely ridiculous as are the van service fees you wanted to charge is 340 for 2 vans to take 5 people and luggage literally around the corner in the end we walked and it only took us 5 10 mins. Breakfast again is way overpriced if buying it each morning. Check in was an absolute nightmare. It took over 2 hours to check our group in and even after we were done only 1 of the 4 rooms were ready. Room service meals were consistently cold or wrong and extras were added into orders even when they were not on the menu or asked for specially. Although I liked the rooms and locations I would not stay at your hotel again as there were many more negatives than there were positives.

Best Hotel in town. This hotel is definitely one of the best hotels I have stayed in all over the world. Starting from their car service that picks you up from the airport all the staff dealing with you is very kind and hard working in every single detail for their guests. They are all very nice and smiling all the time speaking fluent English which is something not very frequent in Indonesia. In addition rooms are well equipped by good design wifi connection and are very spacious. The buffet breakfast has a wide range of fabulous products and the restaurant is very good as well combining local dishes with international cuisine. Excellent amenities are well provided and hotel facilities as the gym business room or the magnificent pool with the sea view makes this hotel one of the best ones in the hospitality industry. Special mention to Alfi guest service manager who is responsible for this remarkable experience. To conclude I would recommend this hotel to anyone cause its professionalism in everything it is out of the question.

Very nice hotel great value for money. Staff were courteous and professional. The room was clean spacious and well maintained. The roof top pool was great with a beautiful view overlooking to the beach. Good location. No regret staying in Pullman Bali Legian Nirwana. Looking forward to staying again in this hotel soon.

Perfect. We have just returned home from our holiday at the Pullman and have already rebokedEverything about this resort is fabulous. From the moment we arrived we were treated so well the staff are just beautiful. Fantastic food and drinks that are well priced and the pools are great too. Any one suggestion open the upstairs pool till later and let people have a swim after the downstairs pool bar is closed.

Relaxing visit. Checked in and got an upgrade straight away bonus. Also when checking in I changed my money over rupiah and got a great rate. Room was a lot bigger than I expected and had a huge bathroom. The system of giving rooms their number however is very confusing I ended up needing a hand to eventually find my room and had some trouble finding my friends room as there does not seem to be any method to it. The lifts were also under maintenance at the time but I did not mind using the stairs. The pool areas are very nice but getting a pool chair at the infinity pool was impossible some days and only managed to get a seat up there after the sun went down. Ordered room service food and drinks a few times and it was quick and tasty too. Food and drinks by the pool also came quite fast. Great hotel location with a lot of nice restaurants and bars nearby.
Clean fairly new property with friendly staff. It was clean and the pool overlooked the ocean. This property is not on the beachThe ads are misleading when they say beach front.

Nice but it ’s a pity about the pools. We came on a luxury Escape which was great value for money. The hotel is in a great location. The extras are great. The massages where wonderful outstanding in fact. Food was great except may I suggest that three buffet dinners is to much we would have preferred the third one have been a lunch. Room was great we got an up grade. Staff were wonderful and helpful. BUT the biggest disappointment was the pools. The infinity pool was great but not enough cover up there for my skin cancer prone skin. So really the only other option was the other pool which was impossible to find a pool lounge from 9 4. Sadly for the size of the hotel when busy as it was. the pools not big enough to accommodate so many guests. So may thoughts of spending time by the pool was just not possible.

Very enjoyable. The location was great food was good. Roof top pool was wonderfulI found the rooms to be a little tired but the size was great. The pool on the ground floor is too small for the size of the hotel very hard to get an available lounge. On the whole our stay was great.

Pleasantly surprised. I booked this hotel for our family as it was reasonably priced and guaranteed interconnecting rooms. My expectation was n’t set that high as we wanted to stay at The Padma but as visiting Bali annually the Padma gets way too expensive. so the Pullman it was this year. I would rate this hotel very high it was fantastic. The staff were very friendly even remembering my children ’s names every time we walked out the gate which was lovely. The rooms were kept clean and the staff did an excellent job at this. Every time we walked in the foyer there was always someone cleaning sweeping etc kept immaculate. Breakfast was included in our package and exceeded all expectations. A great spread every morning. Water supplied in your room for drinking as well as for brushing your teeth. We had an ocean view room and was great. Only downfall was the lack of pools. infinity pool on level 3 was ok. Hardly any shade and felt like you were swimming in a big fish pond the way it was tiled out. The ground floor pool was full of kids. do n’t worry I had my two kids with me. kids jumping in splashing those adults who were on holidays trying to relax. babies in nappies floating around kids snoting in it screaming mums and Dads telling toddlers off. phew it was a great pool for those kids but no one else. Maybe I ’m spoilt by the 5 pools the Padma had where the guests could spread out. The Pullman would definitely be 1010 if they had just one more pool. Overall experience was great. Well done to the staff at the Pullman.

Wo n’t be back. Bit a good impression from the moment we stepped off the plane and trapsed with our 3 year old up and down all the signs at the airport looking for our transfer. despite this. Ring arranged they did not send someone. When we arrived they said it was their mistake and that they ’re sorry. The room was a bit disappointing lighting was very dim no lights on roof only dim warm globe lamps which is fine if you do n’t need to see things clearly. Day 3 no water pressure coming from the shower only a dribble. Waited over an hour for water to be restored. Room was cleaned in the afternoon on a few occasions which is slack. The “ free ” photo shoot produced absolutely NO shots in focus to choose from so was a total waste of our time. The free spa vouchers were only able to be used late at night on our last few days due to there being no availability. The pools were dirty and main pool was full of hair and squirrel po. The pool towels smelt. LASTLY and most disturbingly my husband has just been discharged from hospital back in Australia after eating a buffet meal at the hotel on our last night he became violently ill and that infection travelled to his heart and caused serious complications in an otherwise healthy young man with no existing health issues at all. DO NOT EAT AT THIS HOTEL IF YOU VALUE YOUR LIFE. Some serious food safety basics bring broken in the kitchen. All in all for 230 a night for Bali we were VERY disappointed. Had way better for half the price.

Disappointing. The infinity pool made all our clothes stain in a rust orange color that will not wash out. Noticed after day 3 and was not able to swim in the pool for the rest of the holiday. The staff were aware of the situation which made this worse as many on our clothes have now been put in the bin.

Oasis of calm well trained staff. The welcome on a very early Thursday morning was effort less. We arrived very early in the morning and just need bed rest. did notice a few small aromas which where upsetting but deal with later woken early Thursday morning. Our room was beside the infinity pool and from early morning we heard the restock and music started playing we where not happy. kolalas x2. But shortly in the very capable hand of Putua we got a beautiful ground floor new refit. It was amazing quiet clean loads of space We could not recommend the hotel and it ’s staff more highlyit has been the best 4 days in eight years I ’m planning my next extended say for the very near feature. Many that ’s to all the staff front and back of house. Job well done ‍ ♀ ️‍ ♂ ️.

The resort is lovely infinity pool closure should have been disclosed. The Rooms are lovely the staff also. Decent breakfast with lots of options. I like the position of the hotel. It was unfortunate that the infinity pool was closed and that I was advised of the club surf only within three days of my stay.

Good Value for Money. I was initially disappointed after booking multiple rooms at this hotel only to receive an email from them after the free cancellation period to say the infinity pool would be undergoing renovations and not able to be used during our stay there. It was a large part as to why I had booked this hotel. We were upgraded to a larger room however I did n’t come to Bali to sit in my room. The closure of the infinity pool meant that the other pool at the hotel was busy all the time and at times hard to find sun lounges. Despite this I still had a very pleasurable stay at the Pullman. The staff were friendly and rooms were clean. Arya the guest experience officer was lovely and organised a later check out for us which coincided perfectly with our flight times. I selected the package that included breakfast. Breakfast option was plentiful and nice. This hotel is directly opposite the beach and within walking distance from a lot of cafes restaurants and shops. Every night the hotel would have some form of entertainment on the lawn for guest to partake in should they wish including dinners movie nights and live entertainment. For the price this hotel offered great value for money.

Not too bad. Stunning pools stayed here few nights very central quite nice but showers were n’t great low water pressure as it ’s a huge resort and there were no menus in our room or drinks in fridge to. But it ’s ok.

Mixed thoughts. We spent a week at the Pullman with a buffet breakfast included there was plenty of food which was bland over cooked and often tasteless We had snacks by the pool a few days which were also often overcooked how can you ruin chicken strips nachos and spring rolls. The seafood buffet grill again plenty of food but tasteless over cooked the fish was n’t seasoned There were no restaurants with colingThere was 3 pools the roof top poll had no shade there was a kids pool and a pool with nice shaded areas all had bar access The Balinese people are beautiful but the service was very slow The rooms were good clean and spacious The gym the equipment was poor I loved the spa my massage was amazing.
